A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Trying too hard to make something different with zero substance.  Horrible character growth\, cheap jokes that serve no purpose to the story (Luke drinking monster milk).  Pointless side stories(casino planet)\,  pointless characters(phasma) and uncharacteristic actions by characters we have seen grow(Luke).  Excellent special effects and sound\, unfortunately could not save this Titanic(as in sinking ship) of a movie.
